keyPolicies.policyTitle: Backing Theresa May’s Strong and Stable Leadership
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support Theresa May’s stance in Brexit negotiations and work with her.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Local people are backing Daniel Jellyman for stability and Brexit support.

issues.brexitEurope: Supports Theresa May and Brexit negotiations.

community.content: Local people from all political persuasions and backgrounds are backing Daniel Jellyman.

leaflet.personalStatement: We need an MP who is going to back Theresa May’s strong and stable leadership during the Brexit negotiations. We need a person fighting for the best deal for Stoke-on-Trent.

endorsements.endorsement: I used to support Labour, but I feel let down by how they have treated this city for the last fifty years. We have seen no improvements. It is time to vote for a local lad to be our MP.
I have known Daniel since we met at Fenton Sixth Form College. I know how dedicated he is to our city and how hard he will work for everyone, young and old.
We need an MP who supports this and works for local people. This man is Daniel Jellyman, he is a local lad, a local politician and a Brexit supporter.

quotes.text: Local people from all political persuasions and backgrounds are backing local lad Daniel Jellyman to be our next MP. Daniel, was born and lives in Stoke-on-Trent, voted for Brexit and worked in the pottery industry.

images.caption: Daniel Jellyman shaking hands with Theresa May

examples: This City voted overwhelmingly to leave the European Union.
I used to support Labour, but I feel let down by how they have treated this city for the last fifty years.
I have known Daniel since we met at Fenton Sixth Form College. I know how dedicated he is to our city.
We need an MP who is going to back Theresa May’s strong and stable leadership during the Brexit negotiations.
Daniel, was born and lives in Stoke-on-Trent.
We need an MP fighting for the best deal for Stoke-on-Trent. I will be a local MP working in the best interests of each and every resident of our city.
Supports Theresa May and Brexit negotiations.
